text:
Galaxy Lanes

Menu

CHICKEN WINGS - One pound of wings with veggies and ranch or blue cheese dressing - $14.99

SAUCES: Hot - Medium - Mild - Buffalo - Teriyaki - Honey Garlic - Sweet Chili - BBQ - 40 Creek

DRY RUBS: Salt & Pepper - Roasted Red Pepper - Lemon Pepper - Sriracha - Cajun - Mango Habanera - Dill Pickle - Maple Bacon

GALACTIC CHEESIES - Deep fried Thunder Oak Gouda cheese curds - $17.95

Galaxy Lanes

Menu

BREAKFAST SPECIAL - Two eggs, bacon or ham, toast, mini pierogi or home fries, coffee or tea - $14.95

HAND MADE PIEROGI - Sautéed white onions, bacon & sour cream - $13.95

LOCAL POUTINE - B&B Farm fresh fries, cheese curds & gravy - $10.95

HAMBURGER - Homemade 6 oz patty loaded with lettuce, tomato, onions, mustard, ketchup, relish & Galaxy burger sauce - $11.95
